Package metier.graphe.model.dao

Class SecouristeDAO

java.lang.Object
metier.graphe.model.dao.DAO<metier.persistence.Secouriste>
metier.graphe.model.dao.SecouristeDAO
public class SecouristeDAO extends DAO<metier.persistence.Secouriste>
DAO class responsible for handling all database operations related to Secouriste. Provides CRUD operations and custom queries using JDBC.
